price: (11) And Allāh will surely make evident those who believe, and He will surely make evident the hypocrites.
arabic: وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walayaʿlamanna al-lahu alladhīna āmanū walayaʿlamanna al-munāfiqīna
translations: And Allah will surely make evident
And Allah will surely make evident
And He will surely make evident
